mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RECNUM, COM_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, HIT, LIKES, IMAGE, NICK_NAME FROM (SELECT COM_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, HIT, NICK_NAME, LIKES, IMAGE FROM COMM_COOK ORDER BY COM_SEQ DESC)) WHERE RECNUM BETWEEN (#{section}-1)* 90 + (#{pageNum}-1)* 9 + 1 AND (#{section} - 1)*90 + #{pageNum}*9 ORDER BY COM_SEQ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE COMM_COOK SET TITLE = #{title}, ID = 'id', CONTENT = #{content}, REGDATE = sysdate, HIT = #{hit}, LIKES= #{likes}, NICK_NAME = #{nick_name} WHERE com_seq = #{com_seq}
